H0.text: list the seven gifts of the holy spirit. Wisdom

H1.text: list the seven gifts of the holy spirit. Piety

H2.text: list the seven gifts of the holy spirit. Knowledge

H3.text: list the seven gifts of the holy spirit. fear

A4.text: The seven gifts are wisdom, understanding, counsel, fortitude, knowledge, piety, and fear of the Lord.

A5.text: In the Hebrew version (the Masoretic Text), the 'Spirit of the Lord' is described with six characteristics: wisdom, understanding, counsel, might, knowledge, and 'fear of the Lord'.
